value.name: D.C. Police 'Acted Recklessly' In Fatal Shooting Of Deon Kay, Report Finds
value.description: Members of the Metropolitan Police Department "acted recklessly and without a plan" when a D.C. police officer fatally shot 18-year-old Deon Kay in September, even though the use of deadly force ...
